title: Noobs in ranked
body:
don't let newbies play ranked, make it atleast have 450 normal wins before ranking, a lot of people have to suffer from noobs.
So if it was like this , there will be no dumb ducks in ranked. Please riot, I'm b5 because of  this.
This is a genius idea, ranked queue matters to people who actually take it seriously. 
This is the best idea ever

replies.body: somewhere between 250-350 would be about right because it only take about 150-200 to max level 30. But this is a great idea, I am almost always matched with people with fewer then 300 wins when i'm sitting on just under 1200 though i've been playing for a long time.
Actually me and all my friends got level 30 in 100 norm wins

While I am all for having a minimal normal games played before being allowed into Ranked, but your attitude in this post is so comical I can't take it seriously.

>  I'm b5 because of this.

Haha this line is truly gold, I agree on the "genius" part.

450 games before ranked, that would mean the queue time would take a day, tbh something like 150 or slightly higher would certainly do the trick already.
